thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Veru Says On March 5 Entered Into Credit Agreement For Synthetic Royalty Financing Transaction

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Veru Says On March 5 Entered Into Credit Agreement For Synthetic Royalty Financing Transaction

organizations.name: entered into credit agreement for synthetic royalty financing transaction march

text:
March 6 (Reuters) - Veru Inc:
* VERU SAYS ON MARCH 5, ENTERED INTO CREDIT AGREEMENT FOR SYNTHETIC ROYALTY FINANCING TRANSACTION - SEC FILING
* VERU - PER TERMS OF CREDIT AGREEMENT, LENDERS TO PROVIDE CO WITH MULTI-DRAW TERM LOAN OF UP TO $12 MILLION
* VERU INC - IN CONNECTION WITH CREDIT AGREEMENT, VERU AND SWK FUNDING ALSO ENTERED INTO A RESIDUAL ROYALTY AGREEMENT, DATED AS OF MARCH 5, 2018
* VERU INC - CO RECEIVED NET PROCEEDS OF ABOUT $9.9 MILLION FROM INITIAL $10 MILLION ADVANCE UNDER CREDIT AGREEMENT Source text: ( bit.ly/2D34SvV ) Further company coverage:
